item.title: AlphaFold
item.description: AlphaFold is an awesome system for predicting protein folding. It works quite well and has some versions you can use on the web.

item.title: PyMol
item.description: Useful Commands Selection and Highlighting To select a specific peptide sequence, use the following command: 1 select pepseq <sequence> Use only single-letter amino acid abbreviations.
